summary: This is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for Saturday, August 10, 2019. It details staff post assignments, shift changes, and leave statuses (sick/annual) for correctional and non-correctional staff. The document is significant as it provides a detailed snapshot of staffing at the facility on the day Jeffrey Epstein died.

persons.name: Noel, T
persons.context: Listed as an officer assigned to various posts including SHU (Special Housing Unit) and involved in shift changes and overtime assignments.

persons.context: Officer listed with status changes, including being marked for sick/annual leave and involved in shift relief assignments.

persons.context: Appears in a list of officers with leave statuses (COP - Court Order Pay).

persons.context: Listed as an officer on sick leave being relieved from a post.

events.title: MCC Staff Assignment Roster
events.description: Daily assignment and shift log for correctional staff at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC), New York, NY
keyFacts: This is a staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York dated Saturday, August 10, 2019.
The document details specific posts (e.g., SHU - Special Housing Unit, CONTROL, LOBBY, DRY CELL) and staff assignments, including overtime and leave statuses (Sick/Annual).
It provides a detailed operational snapshot of the facility's staffing on the day Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his cell.
The roster includes a 'Recapitulation' summary showing 109 Correctional Services Staff and 18 Non-Correctional Services Staff were scheduled, with 38 Overtime and 4 Comp-time occurrences.
